title: SDE Intern
description: This SDE Intern role is a remote position where the successful candidate will design and develop high-quality web/mobile applications using the MERN stack. The intern will also be responsible for maintaining the codes, working on scalability, developing further features, and suggesting possible features for product enhancement. Skills used includes MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.
skills: MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS
